channel.title: Me And Friends Are Making Stunt Group
channel.description:
Hi.
Whether you know it or not, almost everyone who reads this is a huge part of my life. I have my opinions on all of you, good or bad. Mopar is a huge part of my life, and I value everyones opinion on here. Hell, you guys were the first ones that I told about me switching religions. That was probably one of the biggest steps in my life to date, and you guys were the first to know, even before my real life friends. Now, I'm asking for your guys' and girls' opinion on something me and my friends are doing in real life. I don't know if anyone had ever heard of CKY, or JackAss, or any other stunt group, but when me and my friends are together, we are always doing crazy things. We plan to start filming in 3 weeks, when one of my friends gets back from vacation in Maine. Me and my friends have wracked our brains for names, but we can't think of any. We've got tons of stunt ideas, and some gimmicks to. Mostly, for our first film, were just gonna do funny stuff, not TO dangerous. We do this stuff anyways, but we figure why not gain the popular points, and be able to show it to friends later.
Here Are Some Stunt Ideas:
[ul][li]Throwing black cat fireworks at people when they walk their dogs [/li] [li]"Testing" the showers and toilets in home depot[/li] [li]Mooning people.[/li] [li]Drive-by Insults (except were on bikes so it's 10x funnier)[/li] [li]Waiting until newspaper delivery lady comes, and run along side her car, naked.[/li] [li]Streaking down main roads, in 5 'o clock traffic[/li] [li]Jumping out of the back of trucks at 30mph into bushes[/li] [li]Breaking fluorescent lightbulbs over our bare backs[/li] [li]Climbing up trees, and the chopping them down when were in them[/li][/ul]
Those are just a few, we've done all of them except the last one, only because we just thought of it last night. We figure to give it our own touch, in every vid, there will be SOME form of pain/streaking. Yeah, this is highly immature, but this is my last grip on fun. Maybe do a bunch of stuff in hot pink ski masks(My friend has a ski mask fetish). Anyways, were looking for stunt and name ideas. If you guys have any NICE feedback, please post, or ideas.
Thanks for reading,
Buzzy

item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

i poop on u:

How about “stunt junkies” or “stupid stunts inc.” those are pretty cool names.

Thanks for the suggs =)

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Quit fighting above ^

Gotta Catch Them All just leave it for now, even if he is acting cooler then he is it really doesn’t matter, this is the internet after all e.g. 15/F/CALI

anyways will be happy to see these vids Buzzy =)

item.source: Me And Friends Are Making Stunt Group

item.title: Me And Friends Are Making Stunt Group
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:47, topic:117801”][quote author=Buzzy link=topic=167088.msg1557003#msg1557003 date=1183169644]

Omg, you are the gayest dickhead ever. Those aren’t even stunts. They are just shit, like you,

Trying to offend me lol? Why do you even post? To regress your anger? To make me feel bad? What ever your reason is, unless it’s to make you look like every other idiot that’s tried to tell me how to run my life in my eyes, then it’s futile. Give it up idiots. I’m not phased.
[/quote]

I posted because you think you are all bad doing these so called “stunts” when really you are a pussy trying to be cool on the internet, and you failed.[/quote]
Wrong, again. If your going to profile someone, at least make sure your suspicions are correct before you publish them for everyone to see your mistakes. I don’t need to try to look cool, simply because I don’t give a fuck what you, or anyone else thinks of me, otherwise don’t you think I would have flamed back to every pathetic attempt of some idiot who tries to offend me even though I told them not to even try. In fact, I posted here asking for ideas because Mopar is a huge part of my life. Then, people told me they wanted to see them, and I promised they could after they’re filmed/edited. Now, I don’t want this thread locked because people like you try to tempt me into stooping to your level by flaming back… and my intelligent responses may be mistaken as just that, so if you want to kept this debate up, PM me?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 03:47:39 PM[/size][hr][quote=".Flair, post:17, topic:117801"]I’ll produce the film, add sound effects, subtitles etc… and build you an entire website… It’ll all come from me, so since I don’t know you personally wtf they gonna do about it :P[/quote]
Sorry, just saw this post. No thanks, I do all my own tech work. But thanks a lot for the offer =)

Read full topic

[/quote]
Trying to offend me lol? Why do you even post? To regress your anger? To make me feel bad? What ever your reason is, unless it’s to make you look like every other idiot that’s tried to tell me how to run my life in my eyes, then it’s futile. Give it up idiots. I’m not phased.[/quote]

I posted because you think you are all bad doing these so called “stunts” when really you are a pussy trying to be cool on the internet, and you failed.

item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

RXVL:

Lol, have a roman candle war, but wear flame retardant suits.

I did that once with my lil bro, I think I was 10 or 11. It was around july 4th, we got about 40 feet from each other, I still got a lil scar on my stomach. It was totally worth it =)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 10:56:44 AM[/size][hr]By the way, to all the ass holes who are posting on how they want me to go to jail, or have bad things happen to me, like i said, im an asshole, you can watch it, and laugh your ass off, or stfu.
